title: LARGE1 BED 1 BATH ONLY $925.00 / APPLY NOW, PRICES CHANGE DAILY
map_address: Century Arbor Lane near Macon Road
posting_body: We'd love to have you here at The Arbors of Century Center!
or go to <URL> to view more availability and pricing!
Whether it's convenience, prime location, must have amenities, or a spacious home you're looking for, you'll find it here at The Arbors of Century Center!

Living at The Arbors offers it's residents the beauty and solitude of a nature reserve, where our community is in a prime location just a short drive from Wolfchase Mall, Shelby Farms, amazing restaurants, grocery stores, and many other upscale local spots.
We are zoned for award-winning White Station Middle and High School and Shady Grove Elementary School.
You have a wide range of options here at the Arbors of Century Center with seven spacious one, two, and three bedroom floorplans to choose from.
All of our apartment homes come with the essentials such as oversized closets, major appliances, carpet, and aprivate patio or balcony.
In select apartment homes you will have the luxury of vaulted ceilings, built in computer desk, and upgraded appliances.
Come home to The Arbors where our convenient location provides you with immediate access to a multitude of shopping venues, entertainment, and immediate access to major interstates.
Combine this with the peace of mind offered by our dedicated team members and sensational services program and you will know you’ve found a place to call home at The Arbors of Century Center.
Get settled into your new apartment before the holidays with our new reduced pricing.
Hurry in prices are subject to change daily.

Community Grilling Station, Pets Welcome With Breed Restrictions, Lavish Landscaping, Large Closets, Vertical and Mini Blinds Included, On-site Laundry, Short Term Leases, Private Patio/Balcony, Central Heating and Air Conditioner, 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance Service, Fitness Center, Handicap Access, Wash/Dryer Hookup (Electric), Cable Ready, Walk-in Closets, Sports Court, Online Rental Payments, etc.
Zoned for award winning White Station Middle and High School and Shady Oaks Elementary
